identity.name: OneFam - The Modern Heirloom
identity.description: A family tree that feels like a living archive, not a database. We merge the warmth of physical photo albums with the precision of modern data visualization.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

layout_strategies.family_tree: Custom CSS Grid Hierarchy or React Flow for interactive nodes
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for containers. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-serif italic transition-all hover:scale-105 shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-primary/20 text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-sans tracking-wide

cards.base: bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/40 shadow-card rounded-xl p-6 relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-accent/30 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-white/40 border-b-2 border-primary/10 focus:border-primary/50 rounded-t-md px-4 py-3 outline-none transition-all font-serif text-lg placeholder:font-sans placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

hero.usage: Landing page hero or dashboard welcome

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'lucide-react' for icons, 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for utils. Use 'sonner' for toasts.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Override the CSS variables in index.css with the palette provided above. Add the fonts to index.html or import in CSS.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: For the Family Tree, create a 'TreeNode' component. Use CSS Flexbox/Grid with pseudo-elements (::before, ::after) to draw the connecting lines. Do not overcomplicate with heavy D3 libraries unless necessary for zoom/pan.
instructions_to_main_agent.auth: Create a simple 'Login' page with the paper texture background. Use the 'OneFam' logo (text-based, Playfair Display).
instructions_to_main_agent.alerts: Use the 'Electric Lime' twist color for the notification dot or 'New' badges to cut through the earth tones.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic gradients. Use the paper texture overlay with low opacity (mix-blend-mode: multiply) to give depth.
Avoid 'Inter' font. Use 'Manrope' for UI text and 'Playfair Display' for all headings.
Buttons should feel tactile. Add a subtle inner shadow or grain.
For the Family Tree: Ensure lines are curved (border-radius) not sharp right angles, to feel more organic.
Mobile Responsiveness: The tree must be scrollable (overflow-x-auto) or switch to a 'List/Card' view on mobile.
